content: fadewalker fingerless mitts the fadewalker mitts are inspired by the stitch pattern for the jaywalker socks by grumperina the pattern comes in two sizes and was designed for a 5-skein mini set but you can also fade 5 colors of your choice or use a single tonal multi or self-striping yarn for a different look round-by-round instructions are provided in table form to make it easier to see how the instructions for the fade stitch pattern and thumb gusset line up pattern instructions are written for dpns but can be adjusted for the use of 9 circular needles or the magic loop method gauge 32 stitches/44 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch in the round size the pattern comes in two sizes  women s size s 7  women s size m 7 5 recommended needles & notions  set of five 2 25mm us1 dpns or size needed for gauge  stitch markers  scrap of yarn or stitch holder to hold stitches for thumb  tapestry needle to weave in ends yarn fingering-weight yarn in 5 different colors for fade mitt  s 45 yards of color 4 and 35 yards of the other colors  m 55 yards of color 4 and 45 yards of the other colors fingering-weight yarn in tonal multi or striping yarn for one-color mitt  s 185 yards  m 235 yards size s pictured yellow/brown phydeaux yarn down autumnal minis 400y/100g colors 1 attila 2 pumpkin spice 3 copper 4 midas 5 rapunzel size m pictured black/grey knitpicks stroll 231y/50g and stroll tonal 462y/100g colors 1 black 2 train station 3 thunderhead 4 mocha 5 pearlescent fadewalker fingerless mitts p 1 abbreviations used in pattern cdd slip 2 stitches together as if to knit knit 1 pass slipped stitches over k knit k2tog knit 2 together kfb increase by knitting into the front and back of the same stitch ktbl knit through the back loop m1l make 1 left with left needle lift strand between stitches from the front knit through the back loop m1r make 1 right with left needle lift strand between stitches from the back knit through the front loop pm place marker rm remove marker sm slip marker ssk slip first stitch as if to knit slip second stitch as if to knit knit the two slipped stitches together through the back loops instructions follow table for your size small starts on p 3 or medium starts on p 5 repeat for second mitt finishing instructions weave in ends and block enjoy many thanks to my wonderful ravelry test-knitters thewoolyhog and
